# robots@vimeo.com

User-agent: *
Crawl-delay: 0
Disallow: /download/
Disallow: /*/download?
Disallow: /moogaloop/
Disallow: /couchmode/
Disallow: /musicstore/preview
Disallow: /musicstore/download
Disallow: /settings
Disallow: /forgot_password
Disallow: /help/forgot_login
Disallow: /help/verify_email
Disallow: /api
Disallow: /user/verify
